attributes.action:
Stop Theresa May from being Prime minister 
We should decide the next one
attributes.background:
She was a big part of the remain campaign so therefore dose not have the best interests in mind for leaving the EU  
The British public should vote on who the next Prime minister is not the  MP's  of which most were remain voters

rejection.details:
The leadership of political parties is not determined by the Government or Parliament.

The following petition is calling for an early General Election:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133548
